prompts: Create a playful Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a small mammal and has a cheerful expression.
Imagine a cute Pokemon that can blend into forest environments with brown and tan fur.
Design a Pokemon with a long tail and big ears, perfect for exploring grasslands.
Show me a Pokemon that is great at climbing trees and has stripes on its back.
Generate a tiny Pokemon with a round belly and curious personality, often seen in urban areas.
Make a Pokemon that is agile and can easily evade attacks while exploring mountainous terrains.
Give me a Normal-type Pokemon that uses its speed to surprise opponents in battle.
